channel.title: Game Jams on Pandaqi Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Game Jams on Pandaqi Blog

item.title: Less is Store
item.description: Welcome to the devlog for “Less is Store”. This game was created for the GoGodot Jam (iteration 4).

item.title: Windup Wizards
item.description: Alright, so, the GoGodot Jam 2 happened. I decided to participate. This was decided well in advance, and I scheduled my other projects around it.

item.title: Ho Ho Sombrero
item.description: Welcome to my devlog for the game “Ho Ho Sombrero” At the start of December, the “New Horizons” game jam came on my radar.

item.title: Windowsilk
item.description: Welcome to my devlog for the game Windowsilk A local multiplayer game for 1-X players, playing spiders moving across an increasingly chaotic web, catching bugs and avoiding falling off their web.

item.title: Boltcorpse & Sons
item.description: Welcome to my devlog for the video game Boltcorpse & Sons. It will be quite brief, because it was for a very short game jam (The Jame Gam 33) and I had no time to actually track this diary while making the game.

item.title: Bombgoggles
item.description: Welcome to my devlog for the game Bombgoggles. It will be a very brief one, because it’s a very short jam (it’s literally called the Mini Jam) and I can’t even use most of the time we do get.

item.title: Bot Bouldering
item.description: Welcome to the devlog for one of my ideas for the GMTK Jam 2024. It was a mess, things weren’t working, and I’ll be documenting it all because it helps me think through the problems.

item.title: Druids in the Dark
item.description: Welcome to my devlog for the game Druids in the Dark. It was made for a Game Jam (by PirateSoftware) in very little time, because I was too busy finishing other projects.

item.title: Finside Out & Inside Sprout
item.description: Welcome to my devlog for the game jam called So you WANNA Jam!? 2024. The jam was held from August 3th to August 12th by the YouTuber/Game Developer Wannibe Manisha.

item.title: Sunbluck
item.description: Welcome to my devlog for the game Sunbluck. It was made for the Godot Wild Jam 72 in a few days, which is why this devlog will be rather brief.
